Name: OLI_COVISSU_AVIATION
Definition: Underwriting rules used to issue the coverage are specific to those required to issue aviation based life insurance

Description: Blended (Policy has Underwritten and Guaranteed Issue coverages.) Only applies at Policy Level
Name: OLI_COVISSU_PERCOVERAGE
OLI_COVISSU_EXPRESS
Definition: Express Underwriting is a data-driven underwriting process used to render a decision without the need for invasive requirements such as a physical examination or an Attending Physician Statement (APS).

Name: OLI_COVISSU_FULL
Definition: Answering all of the medical questions in the policy.

Name: OLI_COVISSU_GUAR
Definition: The right to purchase insurance without being required to provide evidence of insurability.

Name: OLI_COVISSU_SIMP
Definition: Answering slightly different and less medical type questions as compared to Full Underwriting.
